Trade/Device Name(s): D3 FastPoint L-DFA RSV/MPV Identification Kit
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral antigens (respiratory syncytial virus and human metapneumovirus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for D3 FastPoint L-DFA RSV/MPV Identification Kit using direct immunofluorescence to detect RSV and human metapneumovirus in respiratory specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative identification of respiratory syncytial virus and human metapneumovirus in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs and aspirates/washes from symptomatic patients by direct immunofluorescence using monoclonal antibodies.
